name: Covid-19 Information Website
descr: A website that provides information about Covid 19 and the current status of the patient numbers in the US, and trends of the number of patients and deaths over 30 days. We used an external API, and fetch for getting the statistics from the data server

name: QuizMe
descr: A web-app that allows the users to make quizzes and play quizzes

name: Synbio For Everyone
descr: An interactive web-app that allows the physically challenged students to learn synthetic biology -- hence the name Synbio For Everyone.
